subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Knicks lost out on LeBron James but put themselves in a position to contend for their first playoff berth since 2004 after adding four players to a new lineup with Amar’e Stoudemire.
snippet: The Knicks lost out on LeBron James but put themselves in a position to contend for their first playoff berth since 2004 after adding four players to a new lineup with Amar’e Stoudemire.
